scRNAbaseR 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Load scRNA-seq / RNA-seq Data

    load_rnaseq.Rd

    This function processes multiple scRNA-seq / RNA-seq files, filters based on annotation types, and concatenates data as specified.

    load_rnaseq(
  path,
  concatenation_type = "sum",
  annotation_sides = c("three_prime_UTR", "exon", "five_prime_UTR")
)

    Arguments

    path

    Path to the directory containing scRNA-seq / RNA-seq matrices.

    concatenation_type

    Method to concatenate data: 'sum', 'avr', or 'top_diff'.

    annotation_sides

    A vector of annotation sides to include (e.g., 'three_prime_UTR', 'exon', 'five_prime_UTR').

    Value

    A list of data frames, each corresponding to an annotation type.

    Examples

    load_sc_rnaseq("data/matrices/", concatenation_type = 'sum')
#> Error in load_sc_rnaseq("data/matrices/", concatenation_type = "sum"): could not find function "load_sc_rnaseq"
